name: The ring of the Mad Architect
data: It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom unbelievably much.
It increases the users intelligence phenomenally.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dweomercraft'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'magical engineering'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'order from chaos'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mathematics'.
